short_summary: The Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) K Division. Asset Management requires a service contract that will supply all necessary labour, supervision, transportation, material, tools and equipment to carry out Fuel Storage Tank Inspection services in accordance with the requirements, specifications, terms and conditions detailed with the Request for Proposal (RFP).
